articles.content: Ange Postecoglou has confirmed that Celtic duo David Turnbull and Jota will again not be involved in tomorrows match against Hearts but is buoyant about the strength of his available squad regardless… [+1747 chars]

articles.title: Chelsea star Reece James revealed surgeon told him his knee injury would keep him out for TWO MONTHS - Daily Mail
articles.description: The right-back had been in line for a place in Gareth Southgate's England squad for the World Cup in Qatar in November, but the damage to his knee could put an end to his bid to make the final squad.
articles.content:
Reece James admitted he has been told by a surgeon he could be out for two months with the knee injury he suffered against AC Milan earlier in October.
